DOC.brief_summary: In study , investigator want examine impact coronary artery bypass graft ( CABG ) surgery skeletal muscle mass , muscle metabolism , insulin sensitivity 90 subject . In extent , impact subsequent exercise intervention examine , follow-up 12 month surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Coronary Artery Bypass Graft ( CABG ) Surgery Skeletal Muscle Mass Insulin Sensitivity , Followed Exercise Intervention
DOC.detailed_description: 90 subject undergoing elective CABG surgery include . These subject free orthopedic limitation , severe complication surgery , willing participate 12-week exercise training intervention . At baseline ( surgery ) , follow parameter assess : blood parameter ( glycemic control , lipid profile , anabolic/catabolic hormone , inflammatory marker ) , body composition ( dual x-ray absorptiometry ) , handgrip strength , general subject feature ( medication , gender , age , etc. ) . The first three day surgery , blood sample collect analysis glycemic control , lipid profile , anabolic/catabolic hormone , inflammatory marker . Next , start exercise intervention , 6 12 week exercise training , 12-month follow-up , follow parameter assess : blood parameter ( glycemic control , lipid profile , anabolic/catabolic hormone , inflammatory marker ) , body composition ( dual x-ray absorptiometry ) , handgrip strength , maximal exercise capacity ( ergospirometry test ) , physical activity ( questionnaire ) , quality life ( questionnaire ) . At 12 month follow-up , cardiovascular mortality morbidity ( re-occurrence angina , acute myocardial infarction , need surgery , death ) assess . When initiate exercise intervention , subject randomly ( n=30 group ) assign 12 week standard exercise intervention ( endurance exercise training ) , modify exercise intervention ( endurance exercise training + strength training ) , modify exercise intervention ( endurance exercise training + strength training + oral protein supplement ) . This cluster randomize clinical trial . Investigators execute measurement blind treatment allocation .
DOC.criteria: Elective CABG surgery Willing participate 12week exercise intervention Complicated surgery Severe complication first day CABG surgery Orthopedic limitation interfere proper exercise intervention participation
